entry.summary: RT Scalara One main advantage of indices is the diversification they provide -- not putting all eggs in one basket. How can we quantify this for the Scalara NFT Index? entry.title: RT Scalara: Let's look at how Flexible Leverage Indices work: #FLIs are collateralized debt positions providing positive exposure to the deposited and...
entry.summary: RT Scalara Let's look at how Flexible Leverage Indices work: #FLIs are collateralized debt positions providing positive exposure to the deposited and negative exposure to the borrowed asset. E.g. 1 iBTC-FLI currently represents about $180 $USDC deposited and $85 $WBTC borrowed against. /1
